game.name: Electrocute Skeeter
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: On a sweltering summer day, have you ever been annoyed by the buzzing near your ears? When you see skeeters swarming chaotically in the air by the roadside, don't you just want to wipe them all out at once? Here, skeeters will be continuously drawn in—zap them into crisps with your electric gun!
